analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika bhāvanāya pahātabba hetuka duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: nana bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā
